title: Spack does not properly put an external MPI compiler into the environment on Cray
body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->

When activating an environment with a non-CrayPE MPI library, the MPI compilers are not properly put into the users environment.

Create an environment on Cori-GPU that uses mvapich2 as an external defined by the module file.

Activate the environment.

Build an MPI code and it fails.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack env activate <env with mvapich2 as an external>
$ mkdir -p stupid_test/build && echo "cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.14)\nproject(testmpi C)\nfind_package(MPI 3.0 REQUIRED COMPONENTS C)\n" > stupid_test/CMakeLists.txt && cd stupid_test/build && cmake ..```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->

[lbann-dev-skylake_avx512] vanessen@cgpu12:~/lbann.git/stupid_test/build/stupid_test/build/stupid_test/build> cmake ..
-- The C compiler identification is GNU 8.2.0
-- Check for working C compiler: /opt/gcc/8.2.0/snos/bin/gcc
-- Check for working C compiler: /opt/gcc/8.2.0/snos/bin/gcc -- works
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting C compile features
-- Detecting C compile features - done
-- Could NOT find MPI_C (missing: MPI_C_LIB_NAMES MPI_C_HEADER_DIR MPI_C_WORKS) (Required is at least version "3.0")
CMake Error at /global/common/sw/cray/cnl7/haswell/cmake/3.14.4/gcc/8.2.0/2hef55n/share/cmake-3.14/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:137 (message):
  Could NOT find MPI (missing: MPI_C_FOUND C) (Required is at least version
  "3.0")
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /global/common/sw/cray/cnl7/haswell/cmake/3.14.4/gcc/8.2.0/2hef55n/share/cmake-3.14/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:378 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /global/common/sw/cray/cnl7/haswell/cmake/3.14.4/gcc/8.2.0/2hef55n/share/cmake-3.14/Modules/FindMPI.cmake:1672 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  CMakeLists.txt:4 (find_package)
-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/global/homes/v/vanessen/lbann.git/stupid_test/build/stupid_test/build/stupid_test/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
